21-1290.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes of the Housing Authority of the City of Long Beach, California Regular Meeting held Tuesday,November 9, 2021.A motion was made by Commissioner Allen, seconded by Commissioner Uranga, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Page 1 of 3411 W. OCEAN BOULEVARDCIVIC CHAMBERS, 4:45 PMTUESDAY, DECEMBER 7, 2021CITY OF LONG BEACHHOUSING AUTHORITY OF THE CITY OF LONG BEACH, CALIFORNIA MINUTESYes: 9 - Allen, Price, Supernaw, Mungo, Uranga, Austin, Tanzer, Saro and ZendejasAbsent: 1 - Richardson2.

21-1291.summary: Recommendation to receive and file the Housing Authority Financial and Operational Performance Reports for September 2021.  (Citywide)A motion was made by Commissioner Uranga, seconded by Commissioner Austin, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 9 - Allen, Price, Supernaw, Mungo, Uranga, Austin, Tanzer, Saro and ZendejasAbsent: 1 - Richardson3.

21-1292.summary: Recommendation to adopt resolution approving a revised Voucher Payment Standard Schedule for the Section 8 Housing Choice Voucher Program, effective January 1, 2022 for all zip code areas in Long Beach.  (Citywide)A motion was made by Commissioner Price, seconded by Vice Chair Saro, to approve recommendation and adopt Resolution No. H.A. 05-21.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 9 - Allen, Price, Supernaw, Mungo, Uranga, Austin, Tanzer, Saro and ZendejasAbsent: 1 - RichardsonEnactment No: H.A. 05-214.

21-1293.summary: Recommendation to conduct a public hearing to review the proposed Housing Authority Annual Plan (2021-2022), receive supporting documentation into the record, conclude the hearing; adopt resolution to certify the new Plan, and authorize the Deputy Executive Director to transmit them to the Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD).  (Citywide)Page 2 of 3411 W. OCEAN BOULEVARDCIVIC CHAMBERS, 4:45 PMTUESDAY, DECEMBER 7, 2021CITY OF LONG BEACHHOUSING AUTHORITY OF THE CITY OF LONG BEACH, CALIFORNIA MINUTESVice Mayor Richardson joined the meeting.A motion was made by Vice Chair Saro, seconded by Commissioner Supernaw, to approve recommendation and adopt Resolution No. H.A. 06-21.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 10 - Allen, Price, Supernaw, Mungo, Uranga, Austin, Richardson, Tanzer, Saro and ZendejasEnactment No: H.A. 06-215.
